abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed amendment to the loan
            agreement aims at modifying the project design and
            development objective (PDO) in the original operation, as
            well as its comprehensive approach, to make it consistent
            with, and supportive of, the Government's incremental
            strategy for strengthening the efficiency, effectiveness,
            and impact of Argentina's services in selected
            agencies, and strengthen the management tools of selected
            public entities. Following the economic crisis in 2002-2003,
            the new administration has opted for an approach of
            "strategic incrementals" in its efforts to improve
            governance and public sector performance. This approach is
            based on the promotion of "islands of innovation"
            that provide replicable examples for the undertaking of
            effective governance reforms. In this context, the
            Government and the Bank agreed to a series of Action Plans
            (for CY2004 and CY2005-2006) in order to implement the State
            Modernization Project, thus reflecting this new incremental
            strategy and improve overall project implementation. The
            proposed amendment would also provide for the introduction
            of a new component, fully consistent with the revised
            Project Development Objective of the Loan, which consists of
            the initiation of the second phase of the Social and Fiscal
            National Identification System (SINTyS) program, supported
            under an APL operation the first phase, and successfully
            implemented under Loan 4459-AR. The proposed amendment
            complies with the Articles of Agreement of the Bank, and it
            is thus recommended to approve amending the loan agreement
            in accordance with the terms of this document.
